articles.title: Trump sues to try to stop tax returns from being sent to NY prosecutor
articles.description: President Donald Trump is suing his long-time accounting firm Mazars USA and New York district attorney Cyrus Vance to attempt to stop his accounting records from being sent to the local prosecutor.
articles.content:
Washington (CNN)President Donald Trump is suing his long-time accounting firm Mazars USA and New York district attorney Cyrus Vance to attempt to stop his accounting records from being sent to the local prosecutor.

articles.content:

articles.title: Exclusive: Zarif threatens 'all out war' in case of military strike on Iran
articles.description: In an exclusive interview with CNN's Nick Paton Walsh, Zarif raised the specter of 'all out war' in case of a US or Saudi military strike on the country.
articles.content:
Tehran, Iran (CNN)Iran's foreign minister has raised the specter of "all out war" that Saudi Arabia would have to fight "to the last American soldier" in case of United States or Saudi strikes.
